string.text: The script trader_autoinject.script is out of date. Ammo Crate comes with an up-to-date one, meaning one of your addons overwrote it. Please arrange your addons so the latest version of that script gets enabled/added last.
Ammo Crate requires this script to be up-to-date to enable certain trade features.
You can download the latest version from Github : https://github.com/ahuyn/anomaly-dependencies/tree/master/trader_autoinject
